GSD.description:
mt76: fix use-after-free by removing a non-RCU wcid pointer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit e55bcdd0bf34a8b10d45ce80ebb3164c5292a17d. For more details please see the references link.
